title: PV sales up in low-digits as growth pace moderated in May: SIAM
description: Passenger vehicle dispatches increased by 3.9% in May, setting a new record. Three-wheeler sales surged by 14.7%. Two-wheelers grew by 10.1%. The industry is optimistic about steady growth in 2024-25 due to expected good monsoon and economic development.
